price: 60. Nabii Mucammadow ﷺ tama Nabii Qiisä caagidik kol maaqnem Agay-waaga sinni cakkiy ku-Rabbih xaquk kol yemeete kinni, toysa atu tohut Agay- waagitah yan marih num makkin.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takun mina al-mum'tarīna
